cases.title: Real Cases
cases.description: How we helped manufacturing companies reduce manual work and speed up processes.

case1.title: Product Calculation Configurator
case1.problem: Managers spent 1–2 hours calculating product costs, selecting parameters, and preparing CPQs.
case1.solution: We developed a configurator: dimensions → material → components → cost → PDF.
case1.result1: CPQ in 3–5 minutes instead of 1–2 hours
case1.result4: increased speed of processing incoming requests

case2.title: Material and Cost Calculation Automation
case2.problem: Technical department manually calculated material consumption, weight, labor intensity, and cost for each order.
case2.solution: Created an internal calculation system with ERP integration and automatic specification generation.

case3.title: CPQ and Specification Automation for Suppliers
case3.problem: Large number of incoming requests, managers couldn't keep up with preparing commercial proposals.
case3.solution: Developed a tool that automatically selects products/items, calculates cost, and generates CPQ in the required format.
case3.result2: one manager now handles 3x more requests

case4.title: Automated Production Calculation System
case4.problem: Complex production process calculations: duration, load, materials, cost, deadlines.
case4.solution: We created an internal calculation system that considers product parameters, process sheets, and resource availability.
case4.result3: reduced risk of cost calculation errors

case5.title: Document Flow and Approval Automation
case5.problem: Delays due to manual approvals, lost emails, different document formats.
case5.solution: Implemented an automated approval system: routing, statuses, reminders, document versions.
case5.result4: eliminated human factor in document flow

process.title: How it works
process.description: From mapping your processes to deploying automation — a complete implementation workflow.

step1.label: Analyze Processes
step1.desc: We study your current workflows, bottlenecks, and tasks that consume excessive time.

step2.label: Design System Logic
step2.desc: We define data structures, rules, business logic, and integration requirements.

step3.label: Build Internal Tools
step3.desc: We develop interfaces, automation modules, and calculation/processing engines.

step4.label: Integrate & Connect
step4.desc: The system is linked with your ERP, CRM, document flows, and internal platforms.

step5.label: Roll Out to Teams
step5.desc: We train staff, prepare documentation, and ensure smooth adoption.

step6.label: Learn & Optimize
step6.desc: Continuous improvement based on real usage, metrics, and operational feedback.
